title: Ada and Alley
text:
As you might already know, Ada the Ladybug is a farmer. She has a long alley  of trees. She wants the alley to look good so she has decided to make the heights of all trees equal. She has two possible operations: she can either cut the top of a tree, decreasing its height by one (at cost of1)orcut the tree down (at cost ofheighti).InputThe first line of input will contain1 ≤ N ≤     3*105, the number of trees.The next line will containNintegers0 ≤ Hi≤     109OutputPrint the minimal cost to make the height of all trees in alley equal.Example Input5
1 2 3 4 5Example Output6Example Input3
